005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util;
007
008import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
009import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
010
011/**
012 * Wraps a resource to make it {@link AutoCloseable}.
013 *
014 * @param <T>
015 *          the resource type
016 * @param <E>
017 *          the exception type that may be thrown if an error occurs when
018 *          closing the resource
019 */
020public class AutoCloser<T, E extends Exception> implements AutoCloseable {
021  @NonNull
022  private final T resource;
023  @NonNull
024  private final Closer<T, E> closeLambda;
025
026  /**
027   * Adapt the the provided {@code resource} to be {@link AutoCloseable}, using a
028   * provided closer {@code lambda}.
029   *
030   * @param <T>
031   *          the resource's type
032   * @param <E>
033   *          the exception type that can be thrown when closing
034   * @param resource
035   *          the object to adapt
036   * @param lambda
037   *          the lambda to use as a callback on close
038   * @return the resource wrapped in an {@link AutoCloseable}
039   */
040  @NonNull
041  public static <T, E extends Exception> AutoCloser<T, E> autoClose(
042      @NonNull T resource,
043      @NonNull Closer<T, E> lambda) {
044    return new AutoCloser<>(resource, lambda);
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Adapt the provided {@code resource} to be {@link AutoCloseable}, using a
049   * provided closer {@code lambda}.
050   *
051   * @param resource
052   *          the object to adapt
053   * @param lambda
054   *          the lambda to use as a callback on close
055   */
056  public AutoCloser(@NonNull T resource, @NonNull Closer<T, E> lambda) {
057    this.resource = resource;
058    this.closeLambda = lambda;
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Get the wrapped resource.
063   *
064   * @return the resource object
065   */
066  @NonNull
067  public T getResource() {
068    return resource;
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  @SuppressFBWarnings("THROWS_METHOD_THROWS_CLAUSE_BASIC_EXCEPTION")
073  public void close() throws E {
074    closeLambda.close(getResource());
075  }
076
077  @FunctionalInterface
078  public interface Closer<T, E extends Exception> {
079    /**
080     * This method is called to auto-close the resource.
081     *
082     * @param object
083     *          the resource to auto-close
084     * @throws E
085     *           the exception type that can be thrown when closing
086     */
087    @SuppressFBWarnings("THROWS_METHOD_THROWS_CLAUSE_BASIC_EXCEPTION")
088    void close(@NonNull T object) throws E;
089  }
090}
